sn22.158:1.2: “Kismim nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kim upadaya, kim abhinivissa uppajjanti samyojanabhinivesavinibandhajjhosana”ti?
sn22.158:1.4: “rupe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rupam upadaya, rupam abhinivissa uppajjanti samyojanabhinivesavinibandhajjhosana.
sn22.158:1.8: vinnane sati, vinnanam upadaya, vinnanam abhinivissa uppajjanti samyojanabhinivesavinibandhajjhosana.
sn22.158:1.13: api nu tam anupadaya uppajjeyyum samyojanabhinivesavinibandhajjhosana”ti?
